translation:
Encampment near Canguçu, May 16, 1844. Most Illustrious Sir

It is necessary that Your Lordship, Emílio, indicate to the officer the commission he must carry out, and that he should come with the cattle driver plus four cavalrymen unencumbered; in this city, one hundred cavalrymen arriving from Porto Alegre should arrive, which Your Lordship Your Lordship

God keep Your Lordship Most Illustrious Sir Luís José Ferreira. Lieutenant Colonel Commander of the 8th Battalion of Hunters. Francisco Pedro de Abreu
